channel.title: Help with a new command
channel.description: I want to make a Announcement command. And by this I mean something that says [Suicidalscape]-A player needs your help! I want that to be sent from Suicidalscape(Server) to the whole server. Like a yell kinda. Can anyone help me with this?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 05, 2009, 12:22:24 am[/size][hr]I also want to change the maximum level for combat and skills. I think it is in the Client.Java but I am not sure where it is. Can anyone help me with this also?

item.title: Help with a new command
item.dc:creator: @Cyanidesuicide Cyanidesuicide
item.description:
@Cyanidesuicide wrote:

Thanks for the Code. But you coded it wrong.
You did:

[quote=“jamessemple, post:2, topic:312551”]for the command, here:

if (command.startsWith("announcement") && command.length() > 8 && playerRights > 2) { String text = command.substring(8); yell("[SUICIDALSCAPE]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }[/quote]
and it is suppose to be:

if (command.startsWith("announcement") && command.length() > 10 && playerRights > 2) { String text = command.substring(8); yell("[SUICIDALSCAPE]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
When you did && command.legnth() > 8 you made so it would say [Suicidalscape]:ment text. I fixed it but thanks again for the code.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with a new command
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

for the command, here:

if (command.startsWith("announcement") && command.length() > 8 && playerRights > 2) { String text = command.substring(8); yell("[SUICIDALSCAPE]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

Read full topic
